pageTitle: UPDATE – Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, September 16, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for London, United Kingdom.

Shell Aerocentre
MacDonald-Cartier International Airport

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

London, United Kingdom

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in London, United Kingdom.

Closed to media
